text: Walter Marvin Koenig (; born September 14, 1936) is an American actor, writer, teacher and director. He is known for his roles as Pavel Chekov in Star Trek and Alfred Bester in Babylon 5. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Educators from Chicago Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Educators from New York City
title: Walter Koenig
